items.name: Piano
items.description: This control plays music notes on a piano

items.name: Milestones
items.description: This control shows different events happened during the life time. It applies animations to make the event shows in sequence. In the mobile mode, it shows the event when you scrolling.

items.name: Avatar
items.description: This control gives you avatars with different design.

items.name: Drawing Pad
items.description: This control allows you to add free drawing and text on top of a image. The image can also be saved after drawing.
